name: suksma - erowids' bearcub traipse
milkdrop_raw:
MILKDROP_PRESET_VERSION=201
PSVERSION=2
PSVERSION_WARP=2
PSVERSION_COMP=2
[preset00]
fRating=5.000000
fGammaAdj=1.000
fDecay=0.960
fVideoEchoZoom=0.997
fVideoEchoAlpha=0.000
nVideoEchoOrientation=1
nWaveMode=2

bWaveDots=1

fWaveSmoothing=0.900
fWaveParam=0.000
fModWaveAlphaStart=0.750
fModWaveAlphaEnd=0.950
fWarpAnimSpeed=0.010
fWarpScale=0.010
fZoomExponent=1.00000
fShader=0.000
zoom=1.00000
rot=0.00000
cx=0.500
cy=0.500
dx=0.00000
dy=0.00000
warp=0.01000
sx=1.00000
sy=1.00000

wave_g=0.400
wave_b=0.300

wave_y=0.500

b3x=1.000

wavecode_0_sep=0
wavecode_0_bSpectrum=0
wavecode_0_bUseDots=0

wavecode_0_g=0.500
wavecode_0_b=1.000
wavecode_0_a=1.000
wave_0_per_frame1=
wave_0_per_frame2=t1=q1*0.25;
wave_0_per_point1=n= sample*6.283;
wave_0_per_point2=cubesize=q2;
wave_0_per_point3=fix=1/cubesize *0.5;
wave_0_per_point4=tm=q1*4+sample*4;
wave_0_per_point5=
wave_0_per_point6=xp= sin(tm)*cos(tm*3)*0.5+0.5;
wave_0_per_point7=yp= sin(tm*1.1)*sin(tm*4.1)*0.5+0.5;
wave_0_per_point8=zp= sin(tm*2.9)*cos(tm*1.77)*0.5+0.5;
wave_0_per_point9=
wave_0_per_point10=xp= int(xp*cubesize)/cubesize -0.5+fix;
wave_0_per_point11=yp= int(yp*cubesize)/cubesize -0.5+fix;
wave_0_per_point12=zp= int(zp*cubesize)/cubesize -0.5+fix;
wave_0_per_point13=
wave_0_per_point14=
wave_0_per_point15=//rotate
wave_0_per_point16=ang=t1;
wave_0_per_point17=sang=sin(ang);cang=cos(ang);
wave_0_per_point18=xq=xp*sang + zp*cang;
wave_0_per_point19=yq=yp;
wave_0_per_point20=zq=xp*cang - zp*sang;
wave_0_per_point21=xp=xq;yp=yq;zp=zq;
wave_0_per_point22=
wave_0_per_point23=//rotate
wave_0_per_point24=ang=t1*0.75;
wave_0_per_point25=sang=sin(ang);cang=cos(ang);
wave_0_per_point26=xq=xp;
wave_0_per_point27=yq=yp*sang + zp*cang;
wave_0_per_point28=zq=yp*cang - zp*sang;
wave_0_per_point29=xp=xq;yp=yq;zp=zq;
wave_0_per_point30=
wave_0_per_point31=
wave_0_per_point32=zp= zp+2;
wave_0_per_point33=x= xp/zp + 0.5;
wave_0_per_point34=y= yp/zp * 1.333 + 0.5;
wave_0_per_point35=r=bass;
wave_0_per_point36=g=mid;
wave_0_per_point37=b=treb;

wave_1_per_point25=sang=sin(ang);cang=cos(ang);
wave_1_per_point26=xq=xp;

wave_1_per_point28=zq=yp*cang - zp*sang;

wave_1_per_point33=x= xp/zp + 0.5;
wave_1_per_point34=y= yp/zp * 1.333 + 0.5;

wavecode_2_g=1.000
wavecode_2_b=1.000

wave_2_per_frame1=t1=q1*0.25;
wave_2_per_point1=n= sample*6.283;
wave_2_per_point2=cubesize=q2;
wave_2_per_point3=fix=1/cubesize *0.5;
wave_2_per_point4=
wave_2_per_point5=xp= int(rand(cubesize))/cubesize-0.5+fix;
wave_2_per_point6=yp= int(rand(cubesize))/cubesize-0.5+fix;
wave_2_per_point7=zp= int(rand(cubesize))/cubesize-0.5+fix;
wave_2_per_point8=
wave_2_per_point9=
wave_2_per_point10=//rotate
wave_2_per_point11=ang=t1;
wave_2_per_point12=sang=sin(ang);cang=cos(ang);
wave_2_per_point13=xq=xp*sang + zp*cang;

wave_2_per_point15=zq=xp*cang - zp*sang;
wave_2_per_point16=xp=xq;yp=yq;zp=zq;
wave_2_per_point17=
wave_2_per_point18=//rotate
wave_2_per_point19=ang=t1*0.75;
wave_2_per_point20=sang=sin(ang);cang=cos(ang);
wave_2_per_point21=xq=xp;

per_frame_init_1=mv_x=64;mv_y=48;
per_frame_init_2=nut=0;
per_frame_init_3=stp=0;stq=0;
per_frame_init_4=rtp=0;rtq=0;
per_frame_init_5=wvr=0;
per_frame_init_6=decay=0;
per_frame_init_7=dcsp=0
per_frame_init_8=
per_frame_1=decay=0.95;
per_frame_2=zoom=1.005;
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=monitor=512/8;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=warp=0;
per_frame_7=q1=time*0.4;
per_frame_8=q2=8; //cubesize
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    float2 noise_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw + (0.5-rand_frame.xy);
warp_4=`    float4 noiseVal = (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, noise_uv));
warp_5=`
warp_6=`float2 adj = texsize.zw;
warp_7=`//float2 adj = 0;
warp_8=`
warp_9=`float2 uvn = uv_orig + .005*noiseVal + float2(-1,-1)*adj;
warp_10=`
warp_11=`// sample previous frame
warp_12=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_13=`// darken (decay) over time
warp_14=`    ret.x = (ret.x-1.4*q6)*(1-q6*2.5); //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_15=`
warp_16=`
warp_17=`float burn = saturate(GetBlur1(uvn).x - (noiseVal-0.5)*.15);
warp_18=`float fuel = pow(ret.z*1 + GetBlur1(uv).z*.2,1);
warp_19=`
warp_20=`ret.y = 0;
warp_21=`
warp_22=`if (burn > 0.1)
warp_23=`{
warp_24=`ret.x = fuel*q6*160;
warp_25=`ret.z -= ret.z*q6*120;
warp_26=`}
warp_27=`
warp_28=`else {ret.z += 1.3*q6;
warp_29=`//ret.x = 0;
warp_30=`}
warp_31=`
warp_32=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).x,
comp_5=`
comp_6=`ret = lerp (
comp_7=`GetBlur1(uv).x + GetBlur3(uv).x,
comp_8=`ret,
comp_9=`pow(ret,1));
comp_10=`  
comp_11=`//  ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).x - GetBlur1(uv).x;
comp_12=`    ret = pow(ret,float3(.3,.9,8))*1.25 - .25;
comp_13=`    ret *= 1.0; //gamma
comp_14=`//ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv);
comp_15=` 
comp_16=`}
